PARAGRAPH.STRING: is the largest city in Malawi and the capital of the country's Southern Region as well as the Blantyre District.
had an official population of 646,235 in 2003. The Malawi Broadcasting Corporation (MBC), the country's state broadcaster and the provider of Malawi's only television channel, has its headquarters in
(see List of TV stations). The Supreme Court is also located here.
with flights to South Africa and other African countries.
is named after the eponymous town in South Lanarkshire, Scotland, where the explorer David Livingstone was born.
